measured_by: Quick Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology – Self-Report (QIDS-SR)
justification: “The primary outcome measure for this study is percent change in depression symptom severity on the Quick Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology -Self-Report (QIDS-SR).”
“All participants completed the Work and Social Adjustment Scale (WSAS)… WSAS is a transdiagnostic measure capturing impairments in daily functioning arising from mental health problems.”
“…clinical self-report scales assessing obsessive-compulsive disorder measured by the Obsessive-Compulsive Inventory -Revised (OCI-R).”
“…depression measured by the Self-Rating Depression Scale (SDS).”
“…trait anxiety measured by the trait portion of the State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI).”
“…alcohol addiction measured by the Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test (AUDIT).”
“…apathy measured by the Apathy Evaluation Scale (AES).”
“…eating disorders measured by the Eating Attitude Test (EAT-26).”
“…impulsivity measured by the Barratt Impulsivity Scale (BIS-10).”
“…schizotypy measured by the Short Scales for Measuring Schizotypy (SSMS).”
“…social anxiety measured by the Liebowitz Social Anxiety Scale (LSAS).”

measured_by: Multidimensional Scale of Perceived Social Support (MSPSS)
justification: “Perceived social support was assessed using the 12-item Multidimensional Scale of Perceived Social Support (MSPSS).”
“Perceived stress was assessed using the 10-item Perceived Stress Scale (PSS).”
“Experience of stressful life events in the past 12 months was assessed using the Social Readjustment Rating Scale (SRRS).”
“Childhood traumatic experiences were measured by the Childhood Trauma Questionnaire (CTQ).”
“Physical health comorbidities were measured by the Cumulative Illness Rating Scale (CIRS).”
“…somatic symptoms were measured by the five items … in the Patient Health Questionnaire-15 (PHQ-15).”

measured_by: Computerised adaptive task based on Raven’s Standard Progressive Matrices
justification: “Our final cognitive assessment was abstract reasoning using a computerised adaptive task based on Raven's Standard Progressive Matrices.”
